short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click subtitle words in videos to translate & save them. Export your word list to your favorite language learning platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take your video-watching experience to the next level by turning subtitles into an effective vocabulary builder—without disrupting the fun.

💡 How to use:
1. Watch a video with enabled subtitles 📺
2. Click on unfamiliar words in the subtitles: 
    a) Instantly see translations while watching  ✨ 
    b) Words are automatically added to your vocabulary list 📝
3. Save, export or copy the words to your learning platform or notes 🗄️

🌐 Supported sites:
* YouTube
* Netflix

🛠️ Want More Sites or Features?
Tell us where else you watch videos, or what other features would help your learning, and we’ll do our best to bring them to life!

Take control of your language learning journey—every word, every video, anytime! 🚀
